00037 class KVILIB_API KviDnsResult : public KviHeapObject
00038 {
00039         friend class KviDns;
00040         friend class KviDnsThread;
00041 protected:
00042         KviDnsResult();
00043 public:
00044         ~KviDnsResult();
00045 protected:
00046         int             m_iError;
00047         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pHostnameList;
00048         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pIpAddressList;
00049         QString               m_szQuery;
00050 public:
00051         int error(){ return m_iError; };
00052         // never store nor delete these pointers!
00053         // (these are NEVER 0)
00054         KviPointerList<QString> * hostnameList(){ return m_pHostnameList; };
00055         KviPointerList<QString> * ipAddressList(){ return m_pIpAddressList; };
00056         const QString &query(){ return m_szQuery; };
00057 protected:
00058         void setError(int iError){ m_iError = iError; };
00059         void setQuery(const QString &query){ m_szQuery = query; };
00060         void appendHostname(const QString &host);
00061         void appendAddress(const QString &addr);
00062 };

00066 class KVILIB_API KviDns : public QObject, public KviHeapObject
00067 {
00068         Q_OBJECT
00069         Q_PROPERTY(bool blockingDelete READ isRunning)
00070 public:
00071         KviDns();
00072         ~KviDns();
00073 public:
00074         enum QueryType { IPv4, IPv6, Any };
00075         enum State     { Idle, Busy, Failure, Success };
00076 protected:
00077         void         * m_pAuxData;
00078         KviDnsThread * m_pSlaveThread;
00079         KviDnsResult * m_pDnsResult;
00080         State          m_state;
00081 public:
00083         //
00084         // Public interface
00085         //
00086 
00087         // Lookup start
00088         bool lookup(const QString &szQuery,QueryType type);
00089 
00090         // Current object state
00091         State state(){ return m_state; };
00092 
00093         // Results (return always non null-data..but valid results only if state() == Success or Failure)
00094         int error();
00095         const QString & firstHostname();
00096         const QString & firstIpAddress();
00097         int hostnameCount();
00098         int ipAddressCount();
00099         KviPointerList<QString> * hostnameList();
00100         KviPointerList<QString> * ipAddressList();
00101         const QString & query();
00102         bool isRunning() const;
00103 
00104         // Auxiliary data store
00105         void setAuxData(void * pAuxData){ m_pAuxData = pAuxData; };
00106         void * releaseAuxData(){ void * pData = m_pAuxData; m_pAuxData = 0; return pData; };
00107 protected:
00108         virtual bool event(QEvent *e);
00109 private:
00110         KviDnsResult * result();
00111 signals:
00112         void lookupDone(KviDns *);
00113 };
